meanings.definition: Plants that grow abundantly in nutrient-rich soil.
meanings.sent1: The garden was overrun with richweeds, thriving in the fertile ground.
meanings.sent2: Farmers must constantly battle richweeds to protect their crops.
meanings.sent3: The richweeds in the garden were so happy, they practically waved at the sun.
meanings.sent4: The richweeds spread like wildfire, claiming every inch of the field.
meanings.sent5: The richweeds danced in the breeze, a vibrant sea of green.

meanings.definition: A derogatory term for people who are wealthy but lack moral character.
meanings.sent1: The town gossip referred to the wealthy family as richweeds, hinting at their questionable ethics.
meanings.sent2: Some view the elite socialites as nothing more than richweeds in fancy clothing.
meanings.sent3: The richweeds at the country club always seemed to stir up trouble with their lavish parties.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of society, the richweeds stood tall but with shallow roots.
meanings.sent5: Beneath the facade of luxury, the richweeds hid their true nature.
